OTP_SMS_NO_PHONE_FOUND: You need to register a mobile phone on this account if you want to verify by text message.
OTP_NOT_VALID: Enter the security code exactly as it is shown in the text message
MAX_ATTEMPTS_EXCEEDED: Exceeded number of attempts - please try again later
PWD_POLICY_ERROR: Your password does not meet the password policy requirements
LENGTH_BASED: Your password must be at least 8 characters
REPEATED_CHARACTERS: Your password cannot contain the same character 3 times or more consecutively
ATTRIBUTE_VALUE: Your password cannot be your name, company name or email address
DICTIONARY: Your password must be hard to guess
NO_ACTIVE_SESSION: You must have an active session to proceed with this operation.
COMPANY_FETCH_ERROR: Something went wrong. Enter the company number again.
COMPANY_NOT_FOUND: The company ${company.number} could not be found.
COMPANY_NOT_ACTIVE: You must enter a company number for a company that is active
COMPANY_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED: This user is already authorised to file for ${company.name}
AUTH_CODE_NOT_DEFINED: Company must request an authentication code
AUTH_CODE_INACTIVE: Company must request an authentication code
ERROR_LOGIN_FAILURE: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
LOGIN_EMAIL_FORMAT_ERROR: Please enter a valid email address.
LOGIN_USER_CREDENTIALS_INCORRECT: Enter a correct username and password
LOGIN_USER_CREDENTIALS_INCOMPLETE: Please enter your email address and password
USER_EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: Enter a correct email address and password
LOGIN_ACCOUNT_LOCKED_ERROR: You have entered incorrect details too many times. Your account is now locked for ${softLockMinutes} minutes. You can reset your password if you've forgotten it.
LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_REMAINING_ATTEMPTS: Enter a correct email address and password. You have ${remainingAttempts} attempts left.
LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_LAST_ATTEMPT: Enter a correct email address and password. You have 1 attempts left. If the details you enter are incorrect again your account will be locked for ${softLockMinutes} minutes.
LOGIN_SOFT_LOCK_ERROR: You have entered incorrect details too many times. Your account is now locked for ${softLockMinutes} minutes.
RESET_PASSWORD_TOKEN_EXPIRED_ERROR: The link to reset your password has now expired.
RESET_PASSWORD_VALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS_FORMA: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
REGISTRATION_VALID_TYPE(mail): Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
REGISTRATION_VALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS_FORMAT(: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
CHANGE_PASSWORD_PWD_MISMATCH: The password and the re-entered password must match
REGISTRATION_ERROR_USER_ALREADY_EXIST: An account with this email address already exists
REGISTRATION_SEND_EMAIL_ERROR: We have not saved your information.
INVITE_USER_ADD_USER_TO_COMPANY_ERROR: Something went wrong. Enter the details of the person you want to authorise again.
INVITE_USER_INVITER_NOT_AUTHZ_ERROR: You must be authorised to file for this company
INVITE_USER_INVITED_USER_ALREADY_ASSOCIA: This user is already authorised to file for ${companyName}
